=======
Support
=======

The easiest way for you to get support is by opening a new issue 
on Github at https://github.com/ritabratamaiti/RapidML/issues
or by contacting the author at ritabratamaiti@hiretrex.com

Github: https://github.com/ritabratamaiti/RapidML/issues

Email: ritabratamaiti@hiretrex.com
